metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Rundll32 Activity
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious execution of rundll32, with specific calls to some DLLs with known LOLBIN functionalities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('javascript:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.registerxll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('url.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openurl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('url.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openurla')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('url.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fileprotocolhandler')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zipfldr.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('routethecall')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shell32.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('control_rundll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shell32.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shellexec_rundll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshtml.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('printhtml')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('advpack.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launchinfsection')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('advpack.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('registerocx')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ieadvpack.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launchinfsection')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ieadvpack.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('registerocx')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ieframe.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openurl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shdocvw.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('openurl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('syssetup.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('setupinfobjectinstallaction')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('setupapi.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('installhinfsection')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pcwutl.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launchapplication')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dfshim.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shopenverbapplication')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dfshim.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shopenverbshortcut')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('scrobj.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('generatetypelib')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shimgvw.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('imageview_fullscreen')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('comsvcs.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('minidump')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shell32.dll,control_rundll desk.cpl,screensaver,@screensaver')) OR lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\control.exe') AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shell32.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('control_rundll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl')) OR lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\control.exe') AND startswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('"c:\\windows\\system32\\rundll32.exe" shell32.dll,control_rundll "c:\\windows\\system32\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl",'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious execution of rundll32, with specific calls to some DLLs with known LOLBIN functionalities

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment References: http://www.hexacorn.com/blog/2017/05/01/running-programs-via-proxy-jumping-on-a-edr-bypass-trampoline/, https://twitter.com/Hexacorn/status/885258886428725250, https://gist.github.com/ryhanson/227229866af52e2d963cf941af135a52, https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1433344116071583746, https://twitter.com/eral4m/status/1479106975967240209, https://twitter.com/eral4m/status/1479080793003671557
